original_title: Mendelssohn - Symphony No 1 (London version) - A Midsummer Night's Dream
overview: Continuing his award-winning cycle, Sir John Eliot Gardiner leads the London Symphony Orchestra, his Monteverdi Choir and three talented, young, actors from the Guildhall School in a landmark performance of Mendelssohn’s A Midsummer Night’s Dream, which was performed as part of the 400th anniversary of Shakespeare’s death.
title: Mendelssohn - Symphony No 1 (London version) - A Midsummer Night's Dream
